name: Karthik Hosur
title: Software Engineer
description: I am Karthik Hosur, currently working as a Research Software Engineer at the University of Illinois Chicago. I have experience in spearheading and deploying a multimodal data platform for automating clinical research using technologies like Django, Kafka, and Elasticsearch. Prior to this, I worked as a Software Engineer at Talentmicro Innovations LLC in Bengaluru, India, where I designed and developed a document parsing system using FastAPI and RabbitMQ. I also managed a successful process re-engineering project using ASP.NET and Angular. I have a Master of Science in Computer Science from the University of Illinois Chicago and a Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science from Visvesvaraya Technological University. My technical skills include programmiing languages like Python, Java, and Javascript and databases like PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, etc. I have also worked on several projects, including a URL Shortener Web Application and a real-time Polling Application.
